title: Removal of Existing Door and Frame
description: Remove existing hinged bedroom door, door frame, and hardware. Prepare the opening for drywall repair and barn door conversion.

title: Drywall Repair and Refinishing
description: Repair drywall where the previous door frame was removed. Includes patching, sanding, and preparing the surface for paint.

title: Barn Door Installation
description: Install barn door hardware system and mount the new barn door to ensure smooth and level operation.

title: Barn Door and Hardware Materials
description: Includes a standard pre-finished barn door and a complete hardware track kit suitable for a bedroom entry.

title: Light Switch Relocation
description: Relocate the existing light switch to the opposite side of the door opening. Includes labor by a licensed electrician, Romex wire, new electrical box, and wall patching.
